projects.title: CS 196 Course Website
projects.description: Developed a Gradebook System for CS196 (200+ students) using Flask backend, MySQL database, Google OAuth authentication, Angular frontend, and deployment using Apache2. Write a deployment script for ease of deployment to apache2 server. Designed scripts to parse grades into mysql database. Backend is private for security reasons. Designed and implemented the lectures page and mantain the overall architecture of website.

projects.title: CS 128 Honors Course Website
projects.description: Developed a Gradebook System for CS196 (200+ students) using Flask backend, MySQL database, Google OAuth authentication, Angular frontend, and deployment using Apache2. Write a deployment script for ease of deployment to apache2 server. Designed scripts to parse grades into mysql database. Backend is private for security reasons. Designed and implemented the lectures page and mantain the overall architecture of website.

projects.title: Sorting Visualizer
projects.description: Created an app to visualize bubble sort, selection sort, merge sort, and quick sort algorithms using Cinder UI visualization library.

projects.title: Text-Summarizer
projects.description: Summarizing lectures using T5 text-to-text transfer. Worked on fine-tuning model with lecture transcripts, implementing model using Flask Python for building REST API endpoints,  and user authentication with Google o Auth.

projects.title: Galalaksana
projects.description: Created a website for a food trading company utilising HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Whatsapp Click to Chat API

projects.title: Naive Bayes Classifier
projects.description: Created a na√Øve bayes classifier from scratch and achieved 77% accuracy on the MNIST dataset. Utilized Cinder UI library to create a sketchpad to make the model predict on hand drawn digit

projects.title: Covid-19 LSTM Prediction
projects.description: Used tensorflow and sci-kit learn apis to implement LSTM covid-19 predictions.

projects.title: Ideal Gas Particle Simulator
projects.description: Created a 2 dimensional gas particle simulator and visualization using Cinder UI. Approched using angle free vector representation of velocity under the assumption of perfectly elastic collisions.

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.description: Used Python to create a program that can display custom sudoku boards and solve them using recursion and backtracking algorithm.
